attributes.action: Support David Cameron if he decides to listen to the young and remain in the EU
attributes.background: David Cameron should listen to those who are going to be around in the future. We should offer our support to him if he chooses to consult this referendum, and conclude that he should listen to the young, and use the power invested in him by the people to unite the country before it falls apart.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
